titleStmt.title: Whereas application hath been made to His Majestie by John Forth, and other the late farmers of His Majesties revenue in this kingdom, setting forth, that there are still due and owing to them several great arreares and other summs of mony ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Essex.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)

titleStmt.title: Whereas application hath been made to His Majestie by John Forth, and other the late farmers of His Majesties revenue in this kingdom, setting forth, that there are still due and owing to them several great arreares and other summs of mony ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Essex.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
Essex, Arthur Capel, Earl of, 1631-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 6 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
